name: Electrocity (Games@MQ)
description:
Electrocity is a 2D top-down puzzle game designed for PC gaming. The player navigates through an industrial environment based off of Nikola Tesla’s early 1900’s electrical inventions. 
The player has a limited supply of three electrical charges that they must sparingly use to solve all the environmental puzzles they are presented with, typically this takes the form of electrical circuits connected by copper wires some of these circuits can be bridged by pushing conductive blocks into conductive receptacles. They succeed at each level by reaching the exit point of each stage, symbolized by hazard warning lines
